textBox.richText: Hannah Muckenhirn will join the team

Hannah Muckenhirn will be joining both the biometrics group at Idiap and the speech group as a PhD student in July 2015 -- co-supervised with Magimai Doss Mathew. Welcome Hannah ! Hannah Muckenhirn obtained a MSc degree in communication systems from EPFL in 2014. She did her master thesis at IBM Research Zurich in the "Novel Signal Processing Algorithms" team for the Dome project. There, she studied the accuracy of the signal processing chain used in radio interferometry. After obtaining her Master's degree, she worked as a data scientist in the industry, focusing mainly on Natural Language Processing and on smart meter data analytics.
Hannah Muckenhirn will join the team
